content: Right on Mark, and this is just as applicable at the preseed/seed/angel stages. There were months at a time when we were so stuck I felt paralyzed, and this was after failing over and over again to raise money despite my best efforts. I was mad but also reflective, then pulled my shit together and accepted that having a few customers, a well-received vision is NOT real traction. Becoming irreplaceable, deeply integrated in your customer’s business processes, and creating value for your customers is the real goal. True traction creates genuine confidence, which sells better than anything. Our earliest investors emphasized number of clients and revenue over genuine traction. Once I found the confidence to push back and follow my instincts, the stars started aligning.
